name: Pro-Pro-Biotics
description:
Use arrow keys to move around. Left click to shoot acid drops.

In this game you play as a probiotic ( a good bacteria in a human gut.)

You can click the 'Status' button to change acid (bullet).

Food will be dropped when enemies get killed. Shooting costs food. 

Game over if the gut acid/gas/energy level too high or too low. 

P.S.

Hi guys, this is my first game! I spent almost a whole week working on this ( the other 3 weeks just procrastinating) . I still love it though it's a bit cranky.  

I got the idea from watching this cool youtube video :  (I know I know, the video's graphics are much better than my silly game. lol)

And I just learned Unity by following this video: 

I feel excited starting the game making journey. I don't know where it will lead me, but I do hope you guys like my game. If not, please leave comments and let me know. I will definitely try to make it better.

Github page:https://github.com/2balancesgames/ProProBiotics
